document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Life Link III Re-Accredited by CAMTS
document.topic_text: Life Link III Re-Accredited by CAMTS Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 37 minutes ago ) MINNEAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Life Link III announces its re-accreditation by the Commission on Accreditation of Medical Transport Systems (CAMTS) for both its rotor wing and fixed wing services.
document.post: Life Link III Re-Accredited by CAMTS Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 37 minutes ago ) MINNEAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Life Link III announces its re-accreditation by the Commission on Accreditation of Medical Transport Systems (CAMTS) for both its rotor wing and fixed wing services.
